name: server
description: Gets information about the current server

options.name: names
options.description: Gets a list of previous names for the current server

options.name: joined
options.description: Show the first recorded joined date of a server member

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the joined date for, default you

options.name: messages
options.description: Show the amount of messages sent by a server member

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the messages for, default you

options.name: minutes
options.description: Show the amount of active minutes of a server member

options.name: user
options.description: The user to see the minutes for, default you

options.name: timeline
options.description: Get a timeline of the first users who joined the current server

options.name: population
options.description: Get age and gender statistics for the current server

options.name: leaderboard
options.description: Show a given leaderboard for the current server
